playstation.title: Final Fantasy VII
playstation.description: An epic role-playing game that follows Cloud Strife and his allies as they battle the evil Shinra Corporation and the enigmatic Sephiroth.

playstation.title: Metal Gear Solid
playstation.description: A stealth action game where players control Solid Snake as he infiltrates a nuclear weapons facility to neutralize the terrorist threat.

playstation.title: Resident Evil 2
playstation.description: A survival horror game set in Raccoon City, where players control Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield as they try to escape a zombie outbreak.

playstation.title: Crash Bandicoot
playstation.description: A platformer where players control Crash Bandicoot as he tries to stop the evil Dr. Neo Cortex from taking over the world.

playstation.title: Gran Turismo
playstation.description: A racing simulation game that offers a realistic driving experience with a wide variety of cars and tracks.

playstation.title: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
playstation.description: An action-adventure game where players control Alucard as he explores Dracula's castle to defeat the dark lord.

playstation.title: Silent Hill
playstation.description: A survival horror game where players control Harry Mason as he searches for his missing daughter in the eerie town of Silent Hill.

playstation.title: Spyro the Dragon
playstation.description: A platformer where players control Spyro, a young dragon, as he rescues his fellow dragons and defeats the evil Gnasty Gnorc.

playstation.title: Tomb Raider
playstation.description: An action-adventure game where players control Lara Croft as she explores ancient tombs and uncovers hidden treasures.

playstation.title: Tekken 3
playstation.description: A fighting game that features a diverse roster of characters and fast-paced combat.

xbox.title: Halo: Combat Evolved
xbox.description: A first-person shooter where players control Master Chief as he battles the alien Covenant on the mysterious ringworld, Halo.

xbox.title: Fable
xbox.description: An action role-playing game where players control a hero whose actions and decisions shape the world around them.

xbox.title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
xbox.description: An RPG set in the Star Wars universe, where players make choices that affect the outcome of the story.

xbox.title: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind
xbox.description: An open-world RPG where players explore the vast land of Morrowind and complete quests.

xbox.title: Ninja Gaiden
xbox.description: An action-adventure game where players control Ryu Hayabusa as he battles enemies and uncovers a dark conspiracy.

xbox.title: Project Gotham Racing
xbox.description: A racing game that rewards players for stylish driving and completing challenges.

xbox.title: Splinter Cell
xbox.description: A stealth action game where players control Sam Fisher as he completes covert missions for the NSA.

xbox.title: Burnout 3: Takedown
xbox.description: A racing game that focuses on high-speed crashes and aggressive driving.

xbox.title: Jade Empire
xbox.description: An action RPG set in a world inspired by Chinese mythology, where players control a martial artist on a quest to save their homeland.

xbox.title: Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge
xbox.description: An aerial combat game set in an alternate history where players control a pilot battling sky pirates.
